item.title: Caps for blood pressure monitor
item.description: This repository contains a STL file of a mold for casting caps for blood pressure monitor. The caps prevent water from entering the cuff when washing. The cap fits Philips blood pressure monitors both mobile and stationary. The blood pressure monitor cuffs are reusable, but needs to be cleaned. The caps are placed on the tube so water can not enter the cuffs. Printing the molds: Print the STL file (silicone_propper.
